summary: This is a simple mod that allows you to furnish the basement (cellar) of the three houses from the Hearthfire DLC by paying 1500 septims to the steward of the house, just like with the rest of the rooms, so you don’t have to manually create each object in the room.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod that allows you to furnish the basement (cellar) of the three houses from the Hearthfire DLC by paying 1500 septims to
the steward of the house, just like with the rest of the rooms, so you don’t have to manually create each object in the room.
author: DovahWanderer
